about_the_game:
This game is a sequel to Little Marisa's Disaster Journey. After Marisa took a lot of rare books from Scarlet Devil Mansion, she decided to try a special magic in the book. However, she was suddenly summoned to a strange world! Marisa will fight to survive. In order to return Gensokyo, she must solve the alien problem, find the truth, save the world and poor Reimu!

Main game features


1. Cut scenes: Most important stories in the game are using cut scenes (video files).

2. Intelligence (INT) system: Marisa's INT level will affect about NPC reaction, the price of sell materials, and game endings.
INT modes: Hard/Demo mode(1-4), Normal mode(5-8), Easy mode(9).
Tips: Only easy mode can get important game information when you are talking to NPC.

3. Day and night system: Some monsters only appear at night. The gate of settlements will close after sunset. You can't talk to human NPC or use shop and other services if the time is too late.

4. Natural resources: Marisa can weed, cut trees and mine rocks. She will exchange them for money or upgrade points.

5. Skill system: Marisa will learn special skill when she has collected a lot of certain natural resources. It allows Marisa to find more rare materials.

6. Adventurer system: Marisa must register adventurer in order to upgrade her level. Only high ranking adventurers can enter some settlements.

7. Puzzle game: Enter dungeons and solve unique puzzles.

8. Multiple endings: Based on Marisa's performance, player will reach different endings. Although the condition of perfect ending is too harsh, but it worth your effort!

9. Final mission: Marisa must disable a rising nuclear missile in order to prevent it destroys the whole planet!

10. Steam cloud.


Note: Please read "Troubleshooting.txt" in the game folder before you play the game. It includes the solutions of game bugs and resolution problems.

Tips: Apart from trials, most of difficult questions have two solutions. For example, buy gold ores is more efficient than gather it slowly. If you are familiar with trade system in the game, then you will find the best way of making money. There is a special device at the final gate will tell you all necessary conditions about how to reach the perfect ending.


Marisa's Inconceivable Journey is the fan game of Touhou Project series which made by Team Shanghai Alice.

short_description: Marisa was suddenly summoned to a different world! It seems this world was invaded by alien. But the truth isn't simple. Now Marisa is in total isolation. She must fight to survive. Can she expose the truth, save the world and Reimu, finally return to Gensokyo?
